Values.value: select DISTINCT L.APPL_VALUE from BCMMGR.BCM_UNVRSL_VALUES_LKUP_L L where L.TYPE_CD IN (%FieldTypeCodeInString%) AND L.APPL_NM = '%ApplicationName%' AND L.UNVRSL_VALUE_CD IN (%UnivValueInString%) AND L.GEOGRAPHY_NM = '%GeographyCode%' AND L.CTGRY_NM = '%Category%' ORDER BY L.APPL_VALUE

select DISTINCT L.UNVRSL_VALUE_CD from BCMMGR.BCM_UNVRSL_VALUES_LKUP_L L where L.TYPE_CD IN (%FieldTypeCodeInString%) AND L.APPL_NM = '%ApplicationName%' AND L.APPL_VALUE IN (%AppValueInString%) AND L.GEOGRAPHY_NM = '%GeographyCode%' AND L.CTGRY_NM = '%Category%' ORDER BY L.UNVRSL_VALUE_CD
